turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to place a pizza order for delivery please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: With whom would you like to make this purchase?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to use Blaze pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Where will they be delivering the pizza to?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: At the Law Library at NSU.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: To whom will this be delivered to?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alex, they already have all my info on file.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I pulled up the info and Im ready if you know what you want to get.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to get a extra large pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What toppings do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Apple wood bacon and pepperoni.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What type of cheese will you like with that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want mozzarella and Parmesan.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What will you like for the sauce?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like the spicy red sauce.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Will that be it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, it will.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order of one extra large pizza with apple wood bacon and pepperoni, mozzarella and parmasean cheese, spicy red sauce will be ready in 30 minutes for delivery. The total will be 24 dollars.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome.
